i never take a day off im starting to see it pay off my musics sounding better while youre always sounding way off im the mother fucking champion and you aint in the playoffs i roll up and i may cough my life is filled with chaos striving for perfection and working to be the greatest while looking at my reflection so certain im gonna make it same people up in my section since birth and that isnt changing my team has got a connection and i want em all saying...
